00034 #include <ctime>
00035 
00036 #include "TransactionLogger.hh"
00037 
00038 using namespace TREX::transaction;
00039 using namespace TREX::utils;
00040 
00041 /*
00042  * class TREX::transaction::TransactionLogger
00043  */ 
00044 // structors 
00045 
00046 TransactionLogger::TransactionLogger()
00047   :m_inHeader(true), m_empty(true), m_hasData(false) {}
00048 
00049 TransactionLogger::~TransactionLogger() {
00050   endFile();
00051 }
00052 
00053 // Modifiers 
00054 
00055 void TransactionLogger::startFile(std::string fileName) {
00056   time_t cur_date;
00057 
00058   fileName = m_log->file_name(fileName);
00059   m_logFile.open(fileName.c_str());
00060   
00061   time(&cur_date);
00062   char *str_date = ctime(&cur_date);
00063   str_date[strlen(str_date)-1] = '\0'; // remove trailing \n
00064   m_logFile<<"<?xml version=\"1.0\" standalone=\"no\"?>\n\n"
00065           <<"<Log date=\""<<str_date<<"\">\n"
00066           <<" <Declare>"<<std::endl;
00067 }
00068 
00069 void TransactionLogger::endFile() {
00070   if( m_logFile.is_open() ) {
00071     if( !m_empty ) 
00072       m_logFile<<" </Tick>\n";
00073     m_logFile<<"</Log>"<<std::endl;
00074     m_logFile.close();
00075   }
00076 }
00077 
00078 void TransactionLogger::declInternal(Symbol const &timeline,
00079                                  Symbol const &owner) {
00080   if( m_inHeader ) {
00081     std::map<Symbol, Symbol>::value_type to_ins(timeline, owner);
00082     if( !m_internals.insert(to_ins).second ) {
00083       m_log->syslog("log")<<"WARN: timeline \""<<timeline
00084                        <<"\" multiply declared as internal.\n";
00085     }
00086   }
00087 }
00088 
00089 void TransactionLogger::declExternal(Symbol const &timeline,
00090                                  Symbol const &owner) {
00091   if( m_inHeader ) {
00092     m_externals[owner].insert(timeline);
00093   }
00094 }
00095 
00096 void TransactionLogger::endHeader(TICK init, std::string const &fileName) {
00097   if( m_inHeader ) {
00098     if( !( m_internals.empty() && m_externals.empty() ) ) {
00099       std::map< Symbol, std::list<Symbol> > intDecl;
00100       std::map<Symbol, Symbol>::const_iterator i;
00101 
00102       startFile(fileName);
00103       for(i=m_internals.begin(); m_internals.end()!=i; ++i) 
00104        intDecl[i->second].push_back(i->first);
00105 
00106       std::map<Symbol, std::set<Symbol> >::const_iterator e;
00107       std::map< Symbol, std::list<Symbol> >::iterator id;
00108 
00109       for(e=m_externals.begin(); m_externals.end()!=e; ++e) {
00110        m_logFile<<"  <Timelines reactor=\""<<e->first<<"\">\n";
00111        id = intDecl.find(e->first);
00112        if( intDecl.end()!=id ) {
00113          while( !id->second.empty() ) {
00114            m_logFile<<"   <Internal name=\""<<id->second.front()<<"\"/>\n";
00115            id->second.pop_front();
00116          }
00117          intDecl.erase(id);
00118        }
00119        std::set<Symbol>::const_iterator ed;
00120        for( ed=e->second.begin(); e->second.end()!=ed; ++ed ) 
00121          m_logFile<<"   <External name=\""<<*ed<<"\"/>\n";
00122        m_logFile<<"  </Timelines>\n";
00123       }
00124       // declaring remaining reactors that do not have exteranl timelines
00125       for(id=intDecl.begin(); intDecl.end()!=id; ++id) {
00126        m_logFile<<"  <Timelines reactor=\""<<id->first<<"\">\n";
00127        while( !id->second.empty() ) {
00128          m_logFile<<"   <Internal name=\""<<id->second.front()<<"\"/>\n";
00129          id->second.pop_front();
00130        }
00131        m_logFile<<"  </Timelines>\n";
00132       }
00133       m_logFile<<" </Declare>"<<std::endl;
00134     }
00135     m_inHeader = false;
00136   }
00137   newTick(init);
00138 }
00139 
00140 void TransactionLogger::newTick(TICK value) {
00141   m_lastTick = value;
00142   m_hasData = false;
00143 }
00144 
00145 void TransactionLogger::logObservation(Observation const &obs) {
00146   if( m_logFile.is_open() ) {
00147     Symbol const &name = obs.object();
00148     if( m_internals.find(name)!=m_internals.end() ) {
00149       openTick();
00150       obs.toXml(m_logFile, 2)<<std::endl;
00151     }
00152   }
00153 }
00154 
00155 void TransactionLogger::logRequest(Symbol const &reactor, goal_id const &goal) {
00156   if( m_logFile.is_open() ) {
00157     std::map<Symbol, std::set<Symbol> >::const_iterator e = m_externals.find(reactor);
00158     if( m_externals.end()!=e ) {
00159       openTick();
00160       m_logFile<<"  <Request from=\""<<reactor<<"\" id=\""<<goal<<"\">\n";
00161       goal->toXml(m_logFile, 3);
00162       m_logFile<<"  </Request>"<<std::endl;
00163     }
00164   }
00165 }
00166 
00167 void TransactionLogger::logRecall(Symbol const &reactor, goal_id const &goal) {
00168   if( m_logFile.is_open() ) {
00169     std::map<Symbol, std::set<Symbol> >::const_iterator e = m_externals.find(reactor);
00170     if( m_externals.end()!=e ) {
00171       openTick();
00172       m_logFile<<"  <Recall from=\""<<reactor
00173               <<"\" id=\""<<goal<<"\"/>"<<std::endl;
00174     }
00175   }
00176 }
00177 
00178 void TransactionLogger::openTick() {
00179   if( !m_hasData ) {
00180     m_hasData = true;
00181     if( m_empty )
00182       m_empty = false;
00183     else
00184       m_logFile<<" </Tick>\n";
00185     m_logFile<<" <Tick value=\""<<m_lastTick<<"\">\n";
00186   }
00187 }
